topic.title: Associating a CSS to your Document

body.p:
The CSS can be provided in a several ways:
Either specified as a PI at the beginning of the XML document: <?xml-stylesheet type="text/css" href="my-style.css" ?>
Specified in the meta section of the HTML document:<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="my-style.css" />
Or specified from the command line using the -css argument:chemistry -in my-doc.xml -css my-style.css -out my-doc.pdf
